tool_description: Musixmatch API for Song Lyrics multi languages
name: Musixmatch | Song Lyrics API
title: Musixmatch | Song Lyrics API

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Make Search. Available types: tracks, artists. And with the returned ***lyrics_url ***you can easily get the lyrics.

api_list.name: Get Lyrics
api_list.description: You can get the lyrics with the lyrics_url you get from the Search endpoint.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://musixmatch-song-lyrics-api.p.rapidapi.com/lyrics/Taylor-Swift/Midnight-Rain/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "musixmatch-song-lyrics-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://musixmatch-song-lyrics-api.p.rapidapi.com/lyrics/{artist}/{track_name}/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "musixmatch-song-lyrics-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
